task.summary: Default task
Additional code added to create delete project functionality
Added user feedback to the delete function
Fixed error with feedback not displaying correct project title
Attempting to implement a undo feature. It doesn't work and I'm not sure how to do it
Removed completed TODO
Removed completed TODO
Changed header displayed on the login page so it no longer shows the admin navigation before logging in
Trying to fix git error
Trying to fix git error
Test commit
Created proposals controller for the admin section as well as a admin proposals view
Fixed error in the proposals controller where the proposals model was not instantiated
Implemented get_proposals method. Got data to render to the view.
Created addProposal view
Created tutor model and implemented add proposal functionality
Created a .gitignore file
Created a .gitignore file
Implemented edit proposal functionality
Converted input boxes to text areas where appropriate. Added labels to select boxes in the admin project sections
Implemented delete proposal functionality
Created admin tutors view
Extracted tutor data from the database and sorted by a ascending order of last name
Implemented add tutor functionality and used Foundation for form validation
Refactored code in the addTutor view and reduced the code from 62 lines to 38. A reduction of 24 lines overall
Refactored addProject view to make it more human readable
Added delete confirmation to the projects view using foundations modal
Made small alterations to the admin header so it now validates
Implemented edit tutor and delete tutor
Modified flashdata so it doesnt echo a div twice
Test hash and salt encryption
Implemented hash and salt encryption for all tutors added to the database. Any tutor added now automatically gets added to the admin table so they can login
Rewrote add project and proposal forms to improve readability and added better form validation
Rewrote edit project, edit proposal and edit tutor forms to improve readability and added better form validation
Added the ability to reveal and conceal a password when adding a tutor
Added a help and advice section to the add tutor form
Minor improvement to help and advice section
Cleaned up jQuery code in the 'addTutor' view to make it more readable and less verbose
Added a 1 pixel border to all buttons
Started to add a user authorisation
Added login for standard user
Added login for standard user
Added login for standard user. If the user is not logged in, a login button will appear. If they are logged in, a log out button will display instead
Improved user feedback for login. Also added a simple function which turns off error reporting in production environments
Changed view port in headers to stop user scaling. With user scaling on, interacting with a form would cause the page to zoom in and not display all the page anymore
Turned on CodeIgniters built in profiler. THIS MUST BE TURNED OFF FOR PRODUCTION. Added flashdata message, which informs the user of a successful newly created tutor
Implemented user sign up
Added the ability to store current logged in user data to the session data through the 'auth' and 'user_auth' files
Moved the location of welcome messages
Incorporated Font Awesome into the project
